title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true seperation of concens, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the controller layer for application logic

title: Authentication vs Authorisation
content: Theres a difference between authentification and autorisation. Authentification means confirming your own identitiy, authorisation meand being allowed access to the system

title: Object-Relational Mapping
content: I have really loved learining about ORMs. Its really simplified the way i create queries in SQL

title: Jaws DB
content: Jaws DB is great because it allows us to host our database, Which we can access through our heroku hosted application.
